price: 19. Mpe bato bazalaki (na ebandeli) sé umma(1) moko sima bakabwani na bokeseni na bango. Soki ezalaki na mokano ya Nkolo nayo te, nde likambo lisilaki kokatama kati na bango na ntina ya maye bazalaki kokesene na yango.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱلنَّاسُ إِلَّآ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَٱخۡتَلَفُواْۚ وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ فِيمَا فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ
footnotes: 1 Umma: Awa elakisi lingomba, bótala suratu Al-Baqarah mokapo: 128.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna al-nāsu illā ummatan wāḥidatan fa-ikh'talafū walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika laquḍiya baynahum fīmā fīhi yakhtalifūna
